gameObject

Class LoopPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObject.GameObject
      • gameObject.StageFeature
        • gameObject.StationaryPlatform
          • gameObject.LoopPlatform

  • public class LoopPlatform
extends StationaryPlatform
    Represents the loop-the-loop platform of the map. The loop-the-loop is separated into 4 smaller curves and 4 references blocks

      • LoopPlatform

        public LoopPlatform()

      • LoopPlatform

        public LoopPlatform(double x,
                    double y,
                    double w,
                    double h,
                    Section section,
                    int xDir)
        The general constructor used to create the loop-the-loop
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the reference block
        y - The y coordinate of the reference block
        w - The width of the reference block
        h - The height of the reference block
        section - The map section the loop is located in
        xDir - The x direction of the curve

        public double getLoopYBase(Unit gameObject)
        Gets the y coordinate of the first loop segment where the gameObject's x coordinate is located
        Parameters:
        gameObject - The object the curve is using to find the y coordinate of the curve depending on the x value of the game object
        Returns:
        The y coordinate
